twitter.content:
When the marketing guys can now be brave enough to code using AI,

Why are you software engineers afraid of marketing yourself on social media?

AI didn't replace writers.

It replaced their right to use em dashes.

People afraid of using Excel,

Ends up buying or building SaaS tools.

The moment you attach Microsoft Teams or Slack to any craft,

You'll lose interest in it within 5 years or sooner.

linkedin.content: 10 essential tips to keep in mind before your next technical interview: research the company, prepare questions, test your setup, have an IDE ready, practice your professional summary, know your resume, review questions on AmbitionBox and Glassdoor, and keep a notebook handy.

10 reasons why idea generation and tool mastery matter today. AI coding tools like Claude Code, Copilot, and Cursor enable rapid transformation of ideas into products. The traditional cycle (Idea > MVP > Ship > Iterate) has accelerated dramatically. AI accelerates building, but engineers still decide what's worth building and how far to take it.

A 10-point guide for employees during their notice period: prepare a handover document, set up knowledge transfer sessions, document ongoing blockers, facilitate ownership transition, collect key documents like relieving letter and Form 16, and request professional recommendations.
